name: Enchanted Forest (Tetra-Bit)
description:
STORYLINE

The character was at the library and studying about the kris properties. Suddenly, he got teleported into the middle of the forest with a diary in his hand. The diary informs him of his adventure to escape and return to his place. Collecting the historical item, he could escape the forest and get teleported back to the library. The items he collected were kept in the diary, as each had its uniqueness and history. Each item was based on Malacca's history, as Malacca is the most historic place in Malaysia. Adding some gamified elements to make learning history fun may help pull through online. Beware, it might scare you. Are you HAWAU enough?

GAME DESCRIPTION

ENCHANTED FOREST is a horror survival game inspired by Resident Evil.

ENCHANTED FOREST is an exciting game besides the horror, players will learn about the history of Malacca. Each level has a different environment and difficulty.

Check out ENCHANTED FOREST to see if you are hawau enough.

WARNING YOU ⚠

Watch your back cause something might be chasing you.

🕹 Be Our Beta Tester 🕹

Tetra-Bit

Date: 4/1/2023 - 18/1/2023

HOW TO DOWNLOAD OUR GAME :

  1. Press download it will direct to Gdrive
  2. Download it from Gdrive
  3. Extract it using WinRar
  4. Press Enchanted Forest Icon
  5. Press New  Game
